testsuite.name: POST /auth/oauth/login

testcase.name: should return 401 OAUTH_LOGIN_FAILED when service throws IllegalStateException
should return 401 OAUTH_LOGIN_FAILED when service throws IllegalArgumentException
should login with OAuth provider and return LoginResponse
